title: Off Street Parking,  Dishwasher, W/D, Pet Friendly, Updated Flat
posting_body: Conveniently located to all that the bay area has to offer, and has a parking space for when you need to get everywhere else!
This property offers a well-maintained sunny 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom, 900-sqft apartment located in beautiful Temescal.
This location cannot be beat with a 7-minute walk to BART, and along with a two-minute walk to AC Transit and the Transbay bus you are ensured an easy commute to San Francisco and downtown Oakland.
There is also quick access to shops, grocery stores, and nearby restaurants.
Situated in a gated, secure, and well-kept 4-plex, this apartment features a recently updated kitchen, portable dishwasher, in unit W/D, and updated bathroom, ample closet space and wood flooring!
The unit also comes with 1 off-street, gated parking spot.
- $30 credit check refundable upon application acceptance
3D Tour (for floorplan purposes - the photos are of the actual unit available): <URL>
